item.title: How-to extend the VMDK and the Windows disk
item.description: I see a lot of environments where the Virtual Machine (VM) disk space must be extended. Prior ESX 3.5 the way to extend a VDMK was to use the vmkfstools command with the -X parameter from the VMware ESX server console. With the coming of ESX 3.5 it is possible to extend the VMDK file when the VM was shutdown.
